featured.text: “A lot of young people don’t want to dress up for work,” says the owner of a software company, “so it’s hard to hire people if you have a conservative dress code.”

definition.zh_def: 軟體是指用於計算機系統的程序和數據，通常用於執行特定任務或功能。
definition.en_def: Software refers to the programs and data used by a computer system to perform specific tasks or functions.
definition.example: She installed new software on her laptop to improve its performance.
